sentences.sCn: 他这个人完全让人捉摸不透。

remMethod.val: un(无) + predict(预言) + able → 不可预知的

trans.tranCn: 不可预知的；不定的；出乎意料的
trans.tranOther: If you describe someone or something as unpredictable, you mean that you cannot tell what they are going to do or how they are going to behave
